org.elasticsearch.common.logging

Interface ESLogger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractESLogger, JdkESLogger, Log4jESLogger, Slf4jESLogger

    public interface ESLogger
    Contract for all elasticsearch loggers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void debug(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.Object... params)
      Logs a DEBUG level message.
      void debug(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.Throwable cause, java.lang.Object... params)
      Logs a DEBUG level message.
      void error(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.Object... params)
      Logs an ERROR level message.
      void error(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.Throwable cause, java.lang.Object... params)
      Logs an ERROR level message.
      java.lang.String getLevel()
      Returns the current logger level If the level is null, it means that the logger inherits its level from its nearest ancestor with a specific (non-null) level value.
      java.lang.String getName() 
      java.lang.String getPrefix() 
      void info(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.Object... params)
      Logs an INFO level message.
      void info(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.Throwable cause, java.lang.Object... params)
      Logs an INFO level message.
      boolean isDebugEnabled()
      Returns true if a DEBUG level message is logged.
      boolean isErrorEnabled()
      Returns true if an ERROR level message is logged.
      boolean isInfoEnabled()
      Returns true if an INFO level message is logged.
      boolean isTraceEnabled()
      Returns true if a TRACE level message is logged.
      boolean isWarnEnabled()
      Returns true if a WARN level message is logged.
      void setLevel(java.lang.String level)
      Allows to set the logger level If the new level is null, the logger will inherit its level from its nearest ancestor with a specific (non-null) level value.
      void trace(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.Object... params)
      Logs a DEBUG level message.
      void trace(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.Throwable cause, java.lang.Object... params)
      Logs a DEBUG level message.
      void warn(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.Object... params)
      Logs a WARN level message.

      Logs a WARN level message.

    • Method Detail

      • getPrefix

        java.lang.String getPrefix()

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()

      • setLevel

        void setLevel(java.lang.String level)
        Allows to set the logger level If the new level is null, the logger will inherit its level from its nearest ancestor with a specific (non-null) level value.
        Parameters:
        level - the new level

      • getLevel

        java.lang.String getLevel()
        Returns the current logger level If the level is null, it means that the logger inherits its level from its nearest ancestor with a specific (non-null) level value.
        Returns:
        the logger level
